data.description: Ticker of coin to activate
A list of standard [ActivationServers](/komodo-defi-framework/api/common_structures/activation/#activation-servers) objects.
Required if not set in `coins` file. Informs the Komodo DeFi Framework API whether or not the coin is expected to function. Accepted values are `0` or `1`
Minimum number of electrum servers to maintain an active connection to.
Maximum number of electrum servers to maintain an active connection to. If not set, defaults to all servers in activation request.
Number of confirmations for the Komodo DeFi Framework API to wait during the transaction steps of an atomic swap.

If `true`, coins protected by [Komodo Platform's dPoW security](https://satindergrewal.medium.com/delayed-proof-of-work-explained-9a74250dbb86) will wait for a notarization before progressing to the next atomic swap transactions step.
QRC20 only. Address of etomic swap smart contract
QRC20 only. Address of backup etomic swap smart contract

A standard [UtxoMergeParams](/komodo-defi-framework/api/common_structures/activation/#utxo-merge-params) object. Used to reduce a wallet's UTXO count in cases where it is causing significantly slower RPC responses.
the address of the user's `coin` wallet, based on the user's passphrase
the amount of `coin` the user holds in their wallet; does not include `unspendable_balance`
the `coin` balance that is unspendable at the moment (e.g. if the address has immature UTXOs)
the ticker of the enabled coin
the number of transaction confirmations for which the Komodo DeFi Framework API must wait during the atomic swap process
the number of coinbase transaction confirmations required to become mature; UTXO coins only
whether the node must wait for a notarization of the selected coin that is performing the atomic swap transactions; applicable only for coins using Komodo dPoW
the result of the request; this value either indicates `success`, or an error, or another type of failure
the name of the coin the user desires to enable
required for ETH/ERC20 and other gas model chains - urls of Ethereum RPC nodes to which the user desires to connect
required for QRC20 only - address of etomic swap smart contract
required for QRC20 only - address of backup etomic swap smart contract

optional for ETH/ERC20 and other gas model chains - Defines the decimals used to denominate the gas station response to gwei units. For example, the ETH gas station uses 8 decimals, which means that "average": 860 is equal to 86 gwei. While the Matic gas station uses 9 decimals, so 860 would mean 860 gwei exactly.

optional for ETH/ERC20 and other gas model chains - Defines the method of gas price calculation from the station response. `"MeanAverageFast"` will use the mean between average and fast fields. `"Average"` will return a simple average value.
Required if not set in `coins` file. Informs the Komodo DeFi Framework API whether or not the coin is expected to function. Accepted values are `0` or `1`

If `true` the Komodo DeFi Framework API will preload transaction history as a background process. Must be set to `true` to use the [my_tx_history](/komodo-defi-framework/api/legacy/my_tx_history/#my-tx-history) method
Number of confirmations for the Komodo DeFi Framework API to wait during the transaction steps of an atomic swap.

If `true`, coins protected by [Komodo Platform's dPoW security](https://satindergrewal.medium.com/delayed-proof-of-work-explained-9a74250dbb86) will wait for a notarization before progressing to the next atomic swap transactions step.
the address of the user's `coin` wallet, based on the user's passphrase
the amount of `coin` the user holds in their wallet; does not include `unspendable_balance`
the `coin` balance that is unspendable at the moment (e.g. if the address has immature UTXOs)
the ticker of enabled coin
Komodo DeFi Framework API will wait for the this number of coin's transaction confirmations during the swap
whether the node must wait for a notarization of the selected coin that is performing the atomic swap transactions
the number of coinbase transaction confirmations required to become mature; UTXO coins only
the result of the request; this value either indicates `success`, or an error or other type of failure
The selected coin was not found or is not activated yet.
The request is malformed or missing required parameters.
Unhandled internal error.
The selected coin was not found or is not activated yet.
The request is malformed or missing required parameters.
Unhandled internal error.
